title: Wall Street Breakfast June 28: G7 Leaders Explore Price Caps on Russian Oil and Gas
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: G7 leaders explore price caps on Russian oil and gas. Morgan Stanley, Bank of America raise dividends; JPMorgan, Citigroup dividend unchanged. Goldman, Wells Fargo to boost Q3 dividends after 2022 stress test. Wall Street bank layoffs expected after capital markets drop off - CNBC. Ernst & Young fined $100M by the SEC over ethics exam cheating. Catch today’s WSB article here.
